Scripts.OnLoad:
local savedAccountInfo = GetSavedAccountName() if savedAccountInfo and savedAccountInfo ~= "" then local accountName, password, autoLogin = unpack(string_explode(savedAccountInfo, "#&|&#")) if password and password ~= "" then self:SetChecked(1) else self:SetChecked(0) end else self:SetChecked(0) end
if GetSavedAccountName() ~= "" then AccountLoginSavePasswordText:Show() AccountLoginSavePassword:Show() else AccountLoginSavePasswordText:Hide() AccountLoginSavePassword:Hide() self:SetChecked(0) end
Scripts.OnClick: if self:GetChecked() then PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOff") GlueDialog_Show("REMEMBER_PASSWORD") else PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOn") AccountLoginAutoLoginText:Hide() AccountLoginAutoLogin:Hide() AccountLoginAutoLogin:SetChecked(0) end

Scripts.OnLoad:
local savedAccountInfo = GetSavedAccountName() if savedAccountInfo and savedAccountInfo ~= "" then local accountName, password, autoLogin = unpack(string_explode(savedAccountInfo, "#&|&#")) if autoLogin == "1" then self:SetChecked(1) else self:SetChecked(0) end else self:SetChecked(0) end
AccountLoginAutoLoginText:Hide() self:Hide()
Scripts.OnShow: if not AccountLoginSavePassword:GetChecked() then self:Hide() AccountLoginAutoLoginText:Hide() end
Scripts.OnClick: if self:GetChecked() then PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOff") GlueDialog_Show("AUTO_LOGIN") else PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOn") end
